channel.title: GRPC on timerring
channel.description: Recent content in GRPC on timerring

item.title: The Different Kind of API Design
item.description: In the daily life, we often hear about different kind of API, such as REST API, GraphQL API, WebSocket, Webhook, RPC and gRPC even the SOAP, so do you know the difference between them? How to choose the right API for your project?
